div.class: col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 backgroundcolor leftPanel middleFeaturedContent

a.span: Federal Hocking Local School County logo

div.p: In the pursuit of excellence, the Hazlet Township Public School District, through a rigorous academic program with high expectations, will provide students with opportunities that lead them to become responsible, independent-thinking, global citizens. The school community will implement this vision through ongoing and honest self-reflection with a commitment to continuous improvement.
